entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:30 PM AST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nain Airport 12:00 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 18 January 2023
